name: Simon, Admrx., Appellant, v. Hudson Coal Company

judges: Before Maxey, C. J., Drew, Linn, Stern, Patterson, Stearne and Hughes, JJ.
parties: Simon, Admrx., Appellant, v. Hudson Coal Company.

opinions.text:
Per Curiam,
The judgment is affirmed on the opinion of Judge Eagen of the court below.
opinions.author: Per Curiam,

attorneys: Alfred E. Swoyer, with him James F. Brady, for appellant.
Francis D. Mahon, with him R. S. 3ouch, for appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
Simon, Admrx., Appellant, v. Hudson Coal Company.
Argued May 25, 1944.
Before Maxey, C. J., Drew, Linn, Stern, Patterson, Stearne and Hughes, JJ.
Alfred E. Swoyer, with him James F. Brady, for appellant.
Francis D. Mahon, with him R. S. 3ouch, for appellee.
June 30, 1944:
